name: phorge
tagline: A self-hosted developer platform for code and task management
description: Phorge is a fork of Phabricator that provides a self-hosted platform for code review, task tracking, wikis, and CI. It features developer tools for collaborative software development and project management.

features.title: Code Review
features.description: Review code changes with inline comments, approval workflows, and diff visualization

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Host Git, Mercurial, and SVN repositories with web-based browsing and access control

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Create and maintain project documentation with Markdown support and version history

features.title: Project Management
features.description: Organize work with milestones, sprints, and customizable project boards

features.title: Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: Support multiple authentication methods including LDAP, OAuth, and two-factor authentication

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Automate workflows with conditional triggers for notifications, assignments, and actions
